quote: Teach self-denial and make its practice pleasure, and you can create for the world a destiny more sublime that ever issued from the brain of the wildest dreamer.

quote: I never worry about action, but only about inaction.

quote: There is nothing in life so irrational, that good sense and chance may not set it to rights; nothing so rational, that folly and chance may not utterly confound it.
quoteFragment: There is nothing in life so irrational...
